name: Point + Click Potion Mixing w/ PCG Herbs
name_original: Point + Click Potion Mixing w/ PCG Herbs
description:
ProcJam 2014 entry; small tech demo. basic mixing system for a "potion shop" sim-style game.

DIRECTIONS:

point-and-click to move bottles, drag the almanac (info book) or to grab ingredients from jars. hover over jars to see names of ingredients, as well as a list of hints regarding their effects. drop ingredients into mixer (brown/ochre rectangular object) to process them and add to a bottle below the tap.

OTHER DETAILS:

names are generated from lists of suffixes and prefixes based on each ingredients effects list. colour tint values of ingredients are also mixed into the potion sprite.
